channel.title: NeXus - iBot, vIarga, iScar -
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img185.imageshack.us/img185/8159/nexusdiagramiv9.png[/img] [img]http://www.rscheata.net/nexus/untitled.JPG[/img] [img]http://www.rscheata.net/nexus/untitled2.JPG[/img] [img]http://www.rscheata.net/nexus/untitled3.JPG[/img] vIarga??? wtf? vIarge is a modified verision of arga with credits etc to taois & crew, built as a plugin/add-on/module or what ever term you prefer for NeXus as on this morning:
Successfully removed their input system, gui etc. Still have work to do on their methods, they have done a fantastic job on the hooks. Their methods work i just dont agree with how they are layed out. The hooks are the valuable part, anyone looking to write BCEL should focus on the hooks.
Why NeXus? 1. GUI 2. Input all scripts can inheritly extend InputMethods so long as Their bot class extends InputBot. Therefore developers can choose to utilize a professional system or write their own. 3. Use of other bots, a Bot can extend any other bot. 4. Script and Random management, Already done or one can write their own. In summary the advantage of building in this system is the use of already made components therefore saving much time. A List of current Components avaible to botmakers ibot color bot input painting //Discuss! And too thoose who are going to yell rippers, lol ripping is where you re-name and re-badge and release as your own. we comply with arga's license:
NOTE: THIS IS FOR EDUCATIONAL USE ONLY. USE OF IT FOR CHEATING IS PROHIBITED. This program is (C) Macrosoft 2006 Authors: Taios (<3) Zappacky Iamadam Virtualmaster Helpers: Pplsuqbawlz The folks that wrote aryan, many things we got help from that bot. Other Credits (In no particular order) Benland100 - For the mouse splines. We have done ugly things implementing them and I'm sure you'll see, cry, then fix them ;-) Semaphore - Gave a great idea (don't think he knew we had the brain capacity to use it) for box solving Everyone Else - Constantly annoying us, pushing ARGA development onwards. You are allowed to modify this all you want for personal use. You may distribute the modified versions with full credits to the origin (Macrosoft). We would rather you not create new versions, but if you must, you must include the README's full unmodified text, this full UNMODIFIED text, and you must give credit. Macrosoft reserves the right to change these terms at any time with or without notice. For now, any scripts or randoms written for Arga MUST BE OPEN SOURCE!. This may change, but it stays for now. ALL DISTRIBUTIONS MUST BE FREE UNLESS EVERY SINGLE MEMBER OF Macrosoft AGREES Please enjoy this bot, it was a lot of work. Project homepage: http://www.rs-resources.com/
[/center]

For one is doesn’t download the list of servers quite often, it crashes randomly whenever it feels like it, it seems, and whenever I try and add a new script NOTHING compiles :\ .

Another thing, the svn doesn’t update for me… that’s probably my fault though.

item.dc:creator: @GenoDemoN GenoDemoN
item.description:
@GenoDemoN wrote:

Mr.Chris – hey thanks for the support but you are right you just made alot of enemies but they added together are weak compared to your new friends.

1337h4x – They how come the person in question was banned over it AND was then found to be running multible aliases(trolling) on your forum? honestly i thoguht this was resolved back in sept? lol if anyone should hold a grudge it would be use since we had the bot out BEFORE you with the damn near same sources.

Read full topic

item.title: NeXus - iBot, vIarga, iScar -
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

[quote=“1337h4x, post:28, topic:35033”][quote author=Mr.Chris link=topic=50264.msg650240#msg650240 date=1166576542]
I really don’t know what you guys have got against RS Cheata. They have a good forum over there, although it first, it looks a little messy, and like Geno has already said, they have never claimed the code is their own.

[/quote]
LMAO You should have heard him getting it out on us when we were working on proj Lixia, all because of getComponentAt(new Point(1,1));!

He was blaming us for using his code, when we found out about it all on our own.[/quote]

Never heard about that, but it seems as if it is over. You people who seem to dislike ruler, Geno and the others drag it on and on. They’ve never said all of the code is their own and there not taking credit for any code that isn’t their own. Just stop acting like a child. I know I’ll probably get a lot of stick for this, but you are acting very childish.

RSCA have done a good job with iBot, iScar, Nexus ect. I think you should start giving them some credit, instead of having a go at them.

Read full topic
